question: izuku and aquarius ?
answer:
Anonymous said: srry ! for the izuku aquarius, can it be sfw?

Aquarius: Do they like to think outside the box or do they stick to the traditional ways that things are done?

  • Izuku goes through a bit of a process with things. He likes to start off doing everything in the traditional way, but if that doesn’t work out for him, then he’s more than capable of thinking outside the box when he has to, even if he may need a little nudge in the right direction. To see this playing out, just look at how his method of using his Quirk has progressed from copying everything that All Might did, to using his own unique style of fighting (all thanks to some Taiyaki and him actually remembering that he has legs…never change, Deku, never change). His way of going about things translates to his relationships, as well, so while he’ll start out doing all of the typical things that you would expect a partner to do, if some of that doesn’t work for you or you need something else entirely, just let him know and he’ll change things up for you.

blog.name: starrylegend
blog.title: Musings of a Lost Soul
blog.description: No, really. I'm completely lost. Anyway, I do original works and requests. Also, feel free to make requests, as there are few exceptions as to what I shall write. Oh, I am also the creator/owner of several characters and concepts that have a DISTINCT connection to my URL. AKA- Legend; Faian Nadal; and others. REQUESTS ARE OPEN, you heathens

title: Master List
body:
Original Works and Requested Works (all works have the tag #enjoy you heathens, or #original works/#requested works)

Rating: PG/PG+

  • BNHA x BH6 AU Head-Cannons: Technically Quirky; Requested by- yarabi99
  • Stan Smith x G. Neutral Reader: The Dance; Requested by- anonymous
  • Rayla x Female Reader: Elven Iridescence; Requested by- myfriendsaregaymem3 
  • Pietro Maximoff x Male Reader: No Such Thing as ‘Too Sweet’; Original Work

Rating: T/T+

  • Stein x Negan Meet-up AU: Remnants Joined; Requested by- yarabi99
  • Fatgum x G. Neutral Reader: My Little Takoyaki; Requested by- anonymous

title: New Blog? Asks? WhO KneW?!
body:
Hey, I’ve been very dead, and I apologize. As my recent obsession with BNHA(Boku No Hero Academia) I wanted to start an ask blog about my favorite ship…EraserMight. I’ve read to many fanfics and started reading lemons again, so might as well do some shit. I’ ll start an ask bog and post pictures, I hope you guys like it.


-Thanks,

              Random

summary: Hi! I may be just rubbish at properly looking things up, but I see other than ko-fi and tumblr asks, u also draw comissions. Do...
question: Hi! I may be just rubbish at properly looking things up, but I see other than ko-fi and tumblr asks, u also draw comissions. Do u have a comission sheet somewhere? Are they open?
answer:
I just finished the last of my comms, so yes, they are open now! You can find the info post here! After some consideration and many, many suggestions from both followers and friends alike, I have decided to raise my prices to this:

Bust: $8

Half body: $10

Comic (3-5 panels): $20

All comms will be colored monochrome style. If you’d like flat simple colors, it will be a $2+ charge, depending on how complicated it is!

I hope these prices still seem affordable and fair, as comms I will accept will still be in my faster, sketchyer style. I’m still hesitant to raise them any further, for fear that people won’t be able to afford them ^^’ Here’s some examples:

Feel free to dm me if you have any futher questions! Thanks to all of you who have supported me thus far! 💖

title: Coincidence?
body: Why is it that most of the students look so much like their mother or more than their father? Ex: Bakugou, Deku, Tsuyu, Uraraka, Aoyama, Koda, Jiro, even the Todoroki family has more of Rei’s genes than Endeavor’s. Is it a coincidence or is Horikoshi just lazy?

reblog.comment: Why is it that most of the students look so much like their mother or more than their father? Ex: Bakugou, Deku, Tsuyu, Uraraka, Aoyama, Koda, Jiro, even the Todoroki family has more of Rei’s genes than Endeavor’s. Is it a coincidence or is Horikoshi just lazy?

title: La Cuarta Temporada De Boku No Hero Academia Estrena Avance #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Anime #BokuNoHeroAcademia
body:
Se publica el segundo tráiler de la cuarta temporada de Boku no Hero Academia (My Hero Academia), que se estrenará en octubre de este año.

¡Esto es lo que muchos de nosotros estábamos esperando! Con el anuncio de la fecha de salida de la cuarta temporada de Boku no Hero Academia, era cuestión de tiempo que saliera un nuevo tráiler. Eso efectivamente sucedió este domingo y vaya que las cosas se…

summary: For the nsfw zodiac ask, can I ask for pisces and scorpio for Shoji Mezo pls uwu
question: For the nsfw zodiac ask, can I ask for pisces and scorpio for Shoji Mezo pls uwu
answer:
Headcanons for the best octo-boy under the cut! 

Pisces: Whose needs are they more focused on during the act? Yours, theirs, or a balance of both?

  • Definitely yours. Shouji is a giver through and through, in everyday life and in the bedroom. He has quite the setup to see to all of your needs, too, not just with what he has below the belt, but with his Quirk, as well. Whatever you need, however long you need it, Shouji will make sure that you are thoroughly taken care of before he even thinks of his own needs.

Scorpio: If they get jealous of how someone is acting around their partner, does it play out in the bedroom?

  • Shouji doesn’t strike me as the type to bring any negative emotions into the bedroom. If he was jealous of how someone acted around you, then he’d talk it over with you outside of the bedroom and resolve things then. He’s a strong guy, and the thought of accidentally hurting you because he was caught up in his emotions honestly terrifies him, so he doesn’t take any chances when it comes to situations like this. With everything being resolved beforehand, though, it could certainly lead to a more passionate round of sex as he tries to reassure you (and himself) that everything is fine now.

  • Shouji doesn’t strike me as the type to bring any negative emotions into the bedroom. If he was jealous of how someone acted around you, then he’d talk it over with you outside of the bedroom and resolve things then. He’s a strong guy, and the thought of accidentally hurting you because he was caught up in his emotions honestly terrifies him, so he doesn’t take any chances when it comes to situations like this. With everything being resolved beforehand, though, it could certainly lead to a more passionate round of sex as he tries to reassure you (and himself) that everything is fine now.
trail.content:
Headcanons for the best octo-boy under the cut! 

Pisces: Whose needs are they more focused on during the act? Yours, theirs, or a balance of both?

  • Definitely yours. Shouji is a giver through and through, in everyday life and in the bedroom. He has quite the setup to see to all of your needs, too, not just with what he has below the belt, but with his Quirk, as well. Whatever you need, however long you need it, Shouji will make sure that you are thoroughly taken care of before he even thinks of his own needs.

Scorpio: If they get jealous of how someone is acting around their partner, does it play out in the bedroom?

  • Shouji doesn’t strike me as the type to bring any negative emotions into the bedroom. If he was jealous of how someone acted around you, then he’d talk it over with you outside of the bedroom and resolve things then. He’s a strong guy, and the thought of accidentally hurting you because he was caught up in his emotions honestly terrifies him, so he doesn’t take any chances when it comes to situations like this. With everything being resolved beforehand, though, it could certainly lead to a more passionate round of sex as he tries to reassure you (and himself) that everything is fine now.

title: Shouto and parents
body:
Shouto hasn’t had much experience with parents in his life. The most he had was his mom, but she’d been forcibly removed form the picture since he was small. His “father” is a dickbag. And older siblings don’t really fill the void as much because, hey, most of the time, they’re kids too (though it’s not like they don’t try to fill the void).

So, up until he starts to go visit rei, he’s a little clueless in that department. And that got me thinking.

Pre-dorms, I like to think that the OG deku-trio have all had some experience with each others parents. But for shouto, it’s been a little different. 

Ochako’s parents are non-hero and uber-supportive, but they live far away so they aren’t around as much, and don’t leave the most lasting impression on Shouto. 

Tenya’s family are/were all pro-heroes. They’re also super supportive, but they have experience with hero work, and i think that while Shouto respects them, after 14+ years of dickbag mcgee looming over his shoulder and judging every little movement, he is wary of hero parents. They may not do it, but he probably can’t help but think that they’re judging him, as a hero-in-training. 

Izuku’s mom is very much a present and supportive non-hero parent, but I don’t think the whole meet-the-parents happened until after the sports festival, and by that point, Shouto is in the process of re-introducing his mom and him back into each other’s life. 

Then everything happens and the dorms are in place, and he makes more friends, and more parents appear, or not. 

But then is the provisional licence. And failing the provisional licence. And the supplementary lessons, which leads me to the Bakugou’s. Back and forth from UA to the lesson site, I think that Shouto and Katsuki have run into the Bakuparents here and then. Shouto has his mom back, but he’s still missing someone to take over his very-traumatizing dad-shaped-void. 

In walks Bakudad, the quieter non-hero parent who listens to his son’s non-stop hero talk with very little understanding of the intricacies, but still gives his undivided attention because that’s what you do when your kid talks about their passions. 

I just want a fic where Shouto and Katsuki are friends and just chill with calm bakudad.

blog.name: thesingingtennisball
blog.title: I Have An Ace Up My Sleeve!!
blog.description: Hi! My name is Colin and I am 15 years old! I am into My Hero Academia, ,Moomins,Scp Foundation, Harry Potter, Harry Potter:Hogwarts Mystery,Night in The Woods, X-Men and a lot of other things! I draw and write occasionally and I will try my best at it! Icon done by @swampwaterdog!

question: Kinoko for the character thing
answer:
First Impression: Does her quirk make people trip? i wonder,,
Impression now: YOUR’RE DOING GREAT BABY I LUV U!
Idea for a story: She does a fungi project for a school science fair, and she accidentally ends up having it grow everywhere.
Favorite moment: definitely when she asks Tokoyami for the photos of Hawks
Unpopular Opinion: sometimes i feel like her quirk isnt the most effective
Favorite Relationship: Romantic: I love to ship her with Jurota, tho Kinoko x Tokoyami sounds like an amazing ship!! Platonic: I feel like she would definitely be friends with Ibara and Shihai!
Favorite Headcanon: She’s excellent at cooking and the only books she reads are on mycology.
